players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Bob: "Charlie is trying to deflect attention from himself by accusing me of being the mafioso."
You: "Bob is lying, I think he's the mafioso."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found evidence."
Bob: "Charlie is trying to deflect attention from himself by accusing me of being the mafioso."
